body: What the hell, I don't know what to say or feel, but this one kept me intrigued

Just in case some of you don't realize it. The Youni girl from episode 1 fucking died. That last page where she's tied up is her death scene, which is why her text bubbles are all fucked. I'm guessing she got cardiac arrest from exhaustion (and from all the drugs they kept shoving into her of course)
Those last compilation of pictures seems... so real.. Considering the Artist has been seen tracing images from his other work Prism.

@AkumaCheisa The 'bots' or dolls/lower donors are genetically modified and infertile prostitutes made from genes of the original donors (non-modified, actual children which are born from couples in the higher floors). The two that escaped is Sheena and Julka, Sheena is an original donor and Julka is a lower donor and they were able to escape the rapists/abusers. In the extra part we only know about the future featuring Julka, it seems like they were able reform the constitution to prevent rape, drugging and abuse which is the common reoccurring theme featuring the guys wearing a mask. TL;DR Think of it as a generally good outcome for a dystopian society story.
Well this was certainly something

>Be Ghost in the Shell (2017) marketer
>"Might be a good idea to have the original creator promote the movie of his IP"
>does research of what he is up to
>finds all his porn
>"lets not use him"
This series is a goddamn masterpiece… imagine a Ufotable-level anime adaptation…

I dont know how something like this could be so well thought out, what a strange dystopian closed-off crime-rampant society that would be, i mean they also thought up of the anatomy of the "donors", absolutely wild

Human imagination scares me sometimes. 8/10

You did it, you crazy son of a bitch you did it. A full English translation, just come out casually like that. Hats of to you. This one is dark, really dark and sits somewhere between the world of  "A Brave New World" and "A Handmaid's Tale". And I love it.
my penis exploded

Wait, what the hell is happening here?
So the two kids somehow got rich? And the bots are manufactured? What happened to the 2 wanted bots do they live happily ever after? I need an explanation.
Now I wait for the full translation of Girllove Diary as well.

@Wikarian99PL basically the NWO (New World Order [whom are really the Ancient Dominion of Satan]) took over and this is what the future looks like, barely pubescent kids banging and getting pregnant (which is bad, 16 is usually the safest if going early) and the majority live in sewers because only "the chosen" live in the light.....

That or the author decided to make a lolicon future.
